content: pussywillow cap size to fit average head 20-22 finished circumference of hat 19 materials one skein each of koigu kpppm 50g/170yd and lace weight mohair such as rowan kidsilk haze lang mohair luxe or lana grossa silkhair size 3 and 5 16 circular needles size 5 dpns or sizes to get gauge bor marker and tapestry needle to sew in ends gauge 23 sts & 35 row = 4 in stitch pattern with one strand of each yarn held together directions with smaller circular needle cast on 108 stitches if you tend to cast on tightly use the larger needle for cast on and then switch to the smaller one for ribbing join to work in the round being careful not to twist pm and begin ribbing pattern row 1 k1 p1 repeat around row 2 knit repeat these two rounds 5 times more or until ribbing measures about 1 ¼ work row 1 again changing to larger circular needle begin hat main pattern row 1 knit row 2 k3 p1 repeat around repeat these two row until hat measures 6 from cast on end with a row 2 begin decreasing
